install.name: DocImport
install.author: Nicholas K. Dionysopoulos
install.description:
DocImport ##VERSION##

The fast way for mass content publishing!

DocImport is an elaborate hack which allows rapid import of a JPA archive containing multiple documents. The imported documents are treated for intra-article links (cross-linking), as well as image file linking. The imported documents end up as new individual articles or update existing articles (with the same alias) in an existing category.

If this is way over your head, you're probably right. This is an overkill, but it really works (when used in conjunction with DocExport).

This mess of a software was rigged together for the purposes of JoomlaPack.net. If you feel it can even remotely help you, drop me a line. Who knows? It might become a product of its own sometime :)
